page.title: 19LIVING IN GOSFORTH,CUMBRIA.
page.content: On the sporting side, Gosforth fields a team in the amateur league of both cricket & rugby, & matches can be seen most week-ends in the playing field. For runners there are now two yearly runs. In Spring comes the half Marathon,& later in the Summer, the 10Km. { For children}there is the Primay school which educates children from 5 until they are 11. This offers many activities typical of schools, such as Sports day, Christmas concerts & visits to places of interest. Before that there is a play-group, held once a week in the Methodist hall.The park provides swings, slides, a tennis court and room for running about. The football pitch is at school. There are flourishing groups of Brownies, Guides Cubs & Scouts. They all meet weekly in the Hut.
